name: .GOM File Extension
summary: Learn about .GOM files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by GOM Player, an audio and video playback program; may contain various kinds of audio or video data that is used for playback in the software.

content: NOTE: While the GOM Player registers the ".gom" file association when the software is installed, it doesn't appear that ".gom" files are actually used for storing or playing audio or video data.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
